quotes.quote: If you wanna make people dream, you've gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!
You find a glimmer of hope, only to lose it. That is when your despair tastes the most divine.
You guys sure are a worthless bunch. If you wanna wallow in your tears, save it for after you've done everything you can!

Anyway, here's my point. Trivial setbacks like yours and mine are nothing but common occurrences in everyday life! Getting hung up over pointless crap like that shows that you're a joke! A complete and utter joke!
Sometimes one must lose the battle in order to win the war.
